## Data

:::{.incremental}
- 2017-18 National Health Survey
  - Conducted by the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS)
  - 2221 small areas (SAs)
  - 1694 (76%) of SAs had survey data
  - Median SA2 sample size: 8
:::
